alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Susquehanna; Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:31PM EDT until July 12 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... West central Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tompkinsville, or near Carbondale, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Archbald, Blakely, Dickson City, Olyphant, Clarks Summit, Jessup, Throop, Clifford and Jermyn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
